returnPolicy.title: Return Policy
returnPolicy.subtitle: We want you to be completely satisfied with your order. Here's our comprehensive return policy.

overview.timeLimitDesc: Return eligible items within 7 days of delivery

detailed.title: Detailed Return Policy
detailed.description: At Rongdhunu, we stand behind the quality of our products and services. Our comprehensive return policy ensures your complete satisfaction.

eligibility.title: Return Eligibility
eligibility.description: Items are eligible for return if they meet the following criteria:
eligibility.condition: Product is in original condition and packaging
eligibility.timeframe: Return request made within 7 days of delivery
eligibility.unused: Product is unused and unopened (for consumables)
eligibility.defective: Product is defective or damaged upon arrival

conditions.title: Return Conditions
conditions.fresh: Products must be unused, unopened, and in original condition
conditions.time: Return request must be made within 7 days of delivery
conditions.packaging: Original packaging and labels must be intact
conditions.receipt: Order receipt or confirmation email required
conditions.damage: Items damaged by customer cannot be returned
conditions.hygiene: Products must be in sellable condition

process.title: Return Process
process.step1: Contact our customer support team immediately
process.step2: Provide order details and reason for return
process.step3: Keep the product in original packaging
process.step4: Wait for pickup or return instructions
process.step6: Get refund processed within 3-5 business days

pickup.title: Free Pickup Service
pickup.description: We offer free pickup service for returns within our delivery areas

store.title: Store Return
store.description: You can return items directly to our physical store location

courier.title: Courier Return
courier.description: For areas outside our pickup zone, courier returns are available

nonReturnable.title: Non-Returnable Items
nonReturnable.description: The following items cannot be returned for safety and business reasons:
nonReturnable.consumed: Already used or partially used personal care items
nonReturnable.hygiene: Personal care items for hygiene reasons

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.description: Approved returns will be refunded using the following methods:
refund.mobile: Mobile banking (bKash, Nagad, Rocket) - Same method used for payment
refund.bank: Bank transfer for large amounts or original payment method
refund.cash: Cash refund for cash on delivery orders
refund.timeline: Refunds processed within 3-5 business days after return approval
refund.partial: Partial refunds for items returned in non-original condition
refund.shipping: Original shipping charges are non-refundable unless product is defective

exchange.title: Exchange Policy
exchange.description: We offer product exchanges for the following scenarios:
exchange.size: Size exchange for clothing and footwear
exchange.defective: Exchange for defective or damaged products
exchange.wrong: Exchange for wrong items sent by us
exchange.process: Exchange process follows the same steps as returns

warranty.title: Product Warranty
warranty.damage: Shipping damage covered if reported immediately
warranty.exclusions: Normal wear and tear not covered by warranty

contact.title: Need Help with Returns?
contact.description: Our customer support team is here to help with all return-related queries:
contact.address: Visit our store: Shanarpar,siddirganj, Narayanganj, Bangladesh

q1.question: How long do I have to return an item?
q1.answer: You have 7 days from the delivery date to initiate a return request.

q2.question: What if I received a damaged item?
q2.answer: Contact us immediately. We will arrange a replacement or full refund for damaged items.

q3.question: Are there any return charges?
q3.answer: Return pickup is free within our delivery areas. For other areas, minimal charges may apply.

q4.question: Can I return consumable products?
q4.answer: Yes, but only if they are unopened, within expiry date, and within 7 days of delivery.

q5.question: How will I receive my refund?
q5.answer: Refunds are processed using the same method as your original payment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our e-commerce platform and services.

ordering.q1: How do I place an order?
ordering.a1: You can place an order through our website or mobile app. Browse our products, add items to cart, and proceed to checkout with your delivery details.
ordering.q2: What is the minimum order amount?
ordering.a2: The minimum order amount for free delivery is set by our admin and may vary. Check our delivery policy for current amounts. There's no minimum for pickup orders.
ordering.q3: Can I modify my order after placing it?
ordering.a3: You can modify or cancel your order within 30 minutes of placing it. After that, please contact our customer service.
ordering.q4: How do I track my order?
ordering.a4: Once your order is confirmed, you'll receive tracking details via SMS and email. You can also track it in your account dashboard.

delivery.a1: We deliver across Narayanganj and surrounding areas including Shanarpar, Siddirganj, and nearby locations. Check our delivery zones during checkout.
delivery.a2: Standard delivery takes 2-4 business days within our delivery areas. Express delivery (1-2 days) is available for an additional fee.
delivery.a3: Same-day delivery is available for orders placed before 2 PM within our express delivery zones for an additional charge.
delivery.a4: Yes, you can choose your preferred delivery date and time slot during checkout for orders over 1000 BDT.

payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: We accept cash on delivery, mobile banking (bKash, Nagad, Rocket), bank transfers, and major credit/debit cards.
payment.a2: Yes, all online payments are processed through secure, encrypted gateways. We use SSL encryption to protect your payment information.
payment.a3: Yes, we offer installment payment options for orders above 5000 BDT through our partner financial institutions.
payment.a4: If payment fails, please try again or contact our customer service. Your order will be reserved for 24 hours.

product.a1: Yes, we guarantee 100% authentic products from authorized suppliers. All products come with manufacturer warranties.
product.q2: What product categories do you offer?
product.a2: We offer a wide range of products including electronics, fashion, home goods, beauty, health, books, and more. Browse our categories for the full selection.
product.a3: Yes, most products come with manufacturer warranties. Warranty details are provided with each product listing.
product.a4: Yes, you can read customer reviews and ratings for products on our website to make informed decisions.

account.q1: How do I create an account?
account.a1: Click the 'Register' button, fill in your details, and verify your email address to complete registration. It's free and takes less than 2 minutes.
account.q2: Can I track my order history?
account.a2: Yes, once you create an account, you can view all your past orders, track current orders, and manage your wishlist in the 'My Account' section.
account.q3: How do I update my profile?
account.a3: Log into your account, go to 'Profile Settings', and update your personal information, delivery addresses, and preferences.
account.q4: What if I forget my password?
account.a4: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions to reset your password.

returns.q1: How long do I have to return an item?
returns.a1: You have 7 days from the delivery date to initiate a return request for eligible items.
returns.q2: What if I receive a damaged item?
returns.a2: Contact us immediately within 24 hours. We will arrange a replacement or full refund for damaged items.
returns.a3: Return pickup is free within our delivery areas. For areas outside our zone, minimal charges may apply.
returns.q4: How will I receive my refund?
returns.a4: Refunds are processed using the same method as your original payment within 3-5 business days.

security.a1: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal and payment information.
security.q2: Do you share my data with third parties?
security.a2: No, we do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except for order fulfillment purposes.
security.q3: How do you protect my payment data?
security.a3: We use secure payment gateways and do not store your payment information on our servers. All transactions are encrypted.
security.q4: Can I trust online shopping with you?
security.a4: Absolutely. We are a verified e-commerce platform with secure payment processing, buyer protection, and excellent customer service.

faq.contactSupport: Our support team is ready to assist you

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for any questions, suggestions, or support needs.
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

overview.title: Privacy Overview
overview.description: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.personal: Personal information like name, email, phone number
collection.usage: Usage data including pages visited and features used
collection.technical: Technical information such as IP address and browser type

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.encryption: Data encrypted during transmission and storage
protection.access: Limited access to authorized personnel only
protection.storage: Secure servers with regular security updates

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.deletion: Right to delete your personal data

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our website

payment.title: Payment Processors
payment.description: We use secure third-party payment processors

analytics.title: Analytics Services
analytics.description: We use analytics to improve our services

contact.title: Privacy Questions?
contact.description: Contact us if you have any questions about this privacy policy

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.description: By accessing and using Rongdhunu's e-commerce platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

service.title: Our Services
service.description1: Online e-commerce platform for quality products and services
service.description2: Secure payment processing and order management
service.description3: Customer support, order tracking, and delivery services
service.description4: Product reviews, ratings, and feedback system

account.title: User Account
account.registration: You must provide accurate information during registration
account.responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining account security
account.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
account.termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms

orders.title: Order Terms
orders.placement: Orders are subject to product availability and acceptance
orders.pricing: Prices are subject to change without notice
orders.cancellation: Orders can be cancelled within 30 minutes of placement
orders.delivery: Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to circumstances beyond our control

allowed.title: You May
allowed.orders: Place legitimate orders for personal or business use
allowed.account: Maintain accurate and up-to-date account information
allowed.feedback: Provide honest feedback, reviews, and ratings

prohibited.title: You May Not
prohibited.fraud: Engage in fraudulent activities or provide false information
prohibited.abuse: Abuse our customer service or staff
prohibited.interference: Interfere with our systems, security, or other users
prohibited.illegal: Use our platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
prohibited.spam: Send spam, malware, or harmful content
prohibited.reverse: Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code

methods.title: Accepted Payment Methods
methods.description: We accept cash on delivery, mobile banking, bank transfers, and other payment methods as listed on our platform. All transactions are processed securely.

processing.title: Payment Processing
processing.description: Payments are processed securely through third-party providers. We do not store your payment information on our servers.

refunds.title: Refunds and Returns
refunds.description: Refunds are processed according to our refund policy. Contact customer support for assistance with returns and refunds.

pricing.title: Pricing and Taxes
pricing.description: All prices are in Bangladeshi Taka (BDT) and include applicable taxes unless otherwise stated.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.data: We collect necessary information to process orders and provide customer service
privacy.security: We implement security measures to protect your personal information
privacy.sharing: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without consent

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Rongdhunu shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the specific service or product in question.

warranty.title: Warranty and Disclaimers
warranty.description: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not warrant that our services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or completely secure. Product warranties are provided by the respective manufacturers.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property on our platform are owned by Rongdhunu or our licensors. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute our content without written permission.

modifications.title: Terms Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated 'Last Modified' date. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our services immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including if you breach these terms. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.description: Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our services will be resolved through negotiation first. If unresolved, disputes will be subject to the jurisdiction of courts in Bangladesh.

law.title: Governing Law
law.description: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the People's Republic of Bangladesh. Any legal action or proceeding shall be brought exclusively in the courts of Bangladesh.

contact.title: Questions About Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Learn about how we use cookies to improve your experience on our website.

what.title: What are Cookies?
what.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website.
what.note: Most websites use cookies to provide personalized experiences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website functionality and security.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences and improve user experience.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to show relevant advertisements and track effectiveness.

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.description: You can control cookies through your browser settings

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Use the toggles above to customize your cookie preferences

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.analytics: We use Google Analytics to understand website usage
thirdParty.payment: Payment processors may set cookies for transaction security

cookies.preferencesSaved: Your cookie preferences have been saved!

contact.title: Cookie Questions?

refund.subtitle: Fair and transparent refund policy for your peace of mind.
